string.text: Who are you people?
Well, well, what do we have here?

You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. The kind that's paid in cold, hard cash. Hand over the cash you've got, and maybe we'll let you pass through in one piece.
Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.
Pleasure doing business with you, pal. Now scram before we change our minds and decide to take more than just your gear.
Yeah, yeah... I'm going.
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some low-life scum like you.
Well, well, what do we have here?
You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. Hand over your gear and whatever else you got, and we'll let you continue on your little journey.

That's none of your concern, stalker. What matters is that you're in our territory, and we've got a toll for trespassers like you. We want every single thing you've got on you. We want it all, and we want it now. We don't care about your problems. You either hand over everything you've got or you're gonna be a fresh meal for the mutants.

You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. The kind that's paid in cold, hard cash. Hand over the cash you've got, and maybe we'll let you pass through in one piece.
Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.
Fine, take it. Just please don't hurt me.
Pleasure doing business with you, pal. Now scram before we change our minds and decide to take more than just your gear.
Yeah, yeah... I'm going.
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some low-life scum like you.
